plot: Marge enters the pretzel vending business, but when she fails, Homer recruits some help from the mob.

Marge goes to work for Frank Ormond,making and selling pretzels and,when he dies,sets up in business for herself. Initially sales are poor until Homer brings in local Mafia boss Fat Tony as her business partner. Sales boom as a result but,unfortunately,any profits vanish due to Fat Tony's 'business agreement' with Homer.—don @ minifie-1
